title: Private events contact information
statement: Private events at STK Salt Lake City can be booked by calling (647) 735-5318 or emailing events.slc@stkhouse.com.

citations.quote: To Plan Your Next Event, Call (647) 735-5318-STK-EVTS. That's (647) 735-5318)-785-3887 or by email at events.slc@stkhouse.com
